thread.title: Nassau DA wiretapped 3 former Oyster Bay officials, sources say
thread.title_full: Nassau DA wiretapped 3 former Oyster Bay officials, sources say | Newsday

author: Robert E. Kessler and Bridget Murphy
title: Nassau DA wiretapped 3 former Oyster Bay officials, sources say
text:
The Nassau County District Attorney's office wiretapped the cellphones of former prominent Oyster Bay Town officials as part of an investigation into corruption, multiple sources familiar with the probe said. They are, from left, former Supervisor John Venditto, former planning and development Commissioner Frederick Ippolito, and former public works Commissioner Frank Antetomaso, the sources said. None of the three men has been charged with any crimes by the district attorney's office. (Credit: James Carbone)
